AboutDescription: Hello! My name is Eloi, I am a Full-Stack developer focused on React and TypeScript, looking for my first opportunity in the market. I have a solid foundation in modern web development and experience with practical projects. Committed to continuous learning and developing clean and efficient code.
ProjectCalcDescription: I created a website in React and JavaScript to help high school students solve mathematical calculations interactively. Inspired by my sister's difficulty, the site contains about 30 formulas, allowing users to calculate any variable within them. I organized everything intuitively, making learning more practical and dynamic.
ContactDescription: If you are looking for a dedicated developer passionate about creating innovative solutions, get in touch! I am always open to new opportunities and challenges. Let's talk about how I can contribute to your project or team.
